dmca.title: Cease and Desist   " Land of Look Behind"
dmca.body:
It has come to my attention starting in 1984 that you and your group Subversive Cinema have released a video/DVD entitled " Land of Look Behinnd."  I have also discovered your DVD several other internet selling websites. You are using my image and copyright poem without my authorization.

Please be advised to immediately cease and desist from any further use of the poem titled " Wisdom and Knowledge" and my image in the   DVD titled "Land of Look Behind", or in the advertising, promotion, and marketing of this DVD by the group Alan Greenberg, Subversive Cinema,etc and request all further pressing cease.  And advise all third party distributors of the new change, and also sticker the current copies of the DVD which you have in inventory is some manner which will clearly convey that the DVD contain the poem of Amde Hamilton, professional known as the "Watts Prophets."  Your willingness to do so would be greatly appreciated in order to rectify this unfortunate incident. We regret the cost and inconvenience which may result for you and the group, but nevertheless must insist that you take the aforementioned actions as soon as possible.
This letter is without waiver or prejudice of any and all rights or remedies, at law or in equity, all of which such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. The buyout for the master $5200 and 7.5% publisher share for old and new release video and DVD.
